title: Can't signup for PBE
body:
Hey,

it doesn't let me signup for pbe for some reason.

I get this message: Something went wrong
Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later.

Thanks for reading,
Chris

replies.body: You might be signing on through the wrong region.  You'll need to log off completely then go directly to the[ EUNE league](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com) page and login from there.  Afterwards, select the [EUNE specific signup](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) page.  Hope that helps!
i cant sign up for pbe it says error:500 and nothing happens plzzz riot can i get a pbe acc?
